alert.note: Alert for Mason (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 08 at 10:00AM EDT until July 08 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. * WHERE...Mason county. * WHEN...From 4 PM EDT this afternoon through this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can batter and exhaust swimmers trying to make it back to land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest swim risk due to high waves and strong currents this evening will be near the Big Sable Point Lighthouse and north toward Nordhouse Dunes.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Please check with your local authorities on potential beach closures.
